column4: Does anybody know how to play .AVI files in Ubuntu? I've got some to work, but others won't play under any plugin or any of the player's I've tried (I've tried it in VLC, Mplayer, and Totem)
I've tried VLC... it only plays the sound and no video
VLC has built in codecs for most of the audio, and video codecs available. I'd update it and try again.
